unnormalised: New Delhi, Oct 26th – In the race to boost domestic manufacturing under the "Make in India" initiative, accurate inventory forecasting is emerging as a critical differentiator. Experts at IIT Bombay are emphasizing the importance of leveraging data analytics to predict demand fluctuations, minimizing waste, and optimizing resource allocation.
